mapper.select: SELECT R.R_NO ,PM.NAME,R.R_DATE ,S.STARTDATE|| ' ' || R.TIME AS TIME,R.CONTENT ,C.CONTENT AS CODE,FC.CONTENT AS PCONTENT FROM P_MEMBER PM, SERVICE S, RESERVATION R, PET P, F_CODE C, F_CODE FC WHERE PM.P_ID = R.P_ID AND S.R_NO=R.R_NO AND P.PET_NO = R.PET_NO AND C.CODE = R.CODE AND P.CODE = FC.CODE
